title: A lamentable dittie composed vpon the death of Robert Lord Deuereux late Earle of Essex who was beheaded in the Tower of London, vpon Ashwednesday in the morning. 1601. To the tune of Welladay.
publisher: [By Edward Allde] for Margret Allde, and are to be solde at the long shop vnder Saint Mildreds Church in the Poultry [by Margaret Allde? or Henry Rocket?],
